content: **point made hat** the point made hat draws inspiration from the original *melt the ice hat* pattern by paul s neary rooted in the tradition of red pointed hats worn by norwegians as a symbol of resistance during the 1940s nazi occupation with a nod to the *nisselue* the tall santa-like cap with tassels the point made hat carries that spirit of craftivism forward in a knit form that is both striking and expressive --- **melt the ice hat** the original melt the ice hat pattern designed by paul s neary of needle & skein may be purchased on ravelry by following this link https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/melt-the-ice-hat 1 all proceeds from the sale of this pattern go to the immigrant aid agencies who will distribute the funds to those impacted by the actions of ice i am releasing my own pattern free of charge for those who prefer this shape/fit but please consider purchasing the original pattern to support this cause even if you knit my free version thanks ♥ 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/melt-the-ice-hat
